WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 19 DEC
   BY M/V SUBSEA VIKING WITH SUBMERSIBLE IN
   AREA BOUND BY
   24-31.35S 042-46.20W, 24-22.58S 042-26.13W,
   24-28.70S 042-22.85W, 24-37.68S 042-43.08W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 20 DEC 18.
